title: Quiz 4 - Blood Relation
instruction: Directions (22-25): Study the following questions and carefully answer it.

quiz.text: Who among the following is the father of T?
options: The person who likes snickers
X
The person who like munch
Either (a) or (b)
Either (a) or (c)

quiz.text: Who among the following likes Ferrero Rocher?
options: R
P
S
Q
W

quiz.text: Who likes temptation and munch respectively?
options: U and V
U and T
V and P
T and R
none of these

quiz.text: How R is related to U and Q respectively?
options: sister and daughter
sister-in-law and mother
daughter and sister
sister-in-law and daughter
none of these

quiz.text: Which of the following is odd one out?
options: Y
U
P
X
none of these

quiz.text: Who is E’s father?
options: S
G
Q
R
none of these

quiz.text: How H is related to E?
options: Daughter
Mother
Sister
Wife
none of these

quiz.text: How P is related to Q?
options: Grandson
Daughter
Granddaughter
wife
none of these

quiz.text: Who is F’s brother?
options: S
E
R
both (a) & (b)
both (b) & (c)

quiz.text: Who is E’s son and R’s father respectively?
options: R and E
P and S
G and S
F and E
none of these

quiz.text: Statements: R ! P # S + J ! Z ; D $ V @ Z ; H x P ? C How Y is related to D if Y is son of P ?
options: Y % D
Y # D
Y ! D
Y & D
none of these

quiz.text: Statements: R ! P # S + J ! Z ; D $ V @ Z ; H x P ? C How is Z related to R?
options: Z is grandson of R
Z $ V
Z # P
Z ^ C
cannot be determined

quiz.text: Statements: R ! P # S + J ! Z ; D $ V @ Z ; H x P ? C How is V related to P?
options: V x P
V @ P
V % P
V ^ P
none of these

quiz.text: E # H @ J * U % T & Q @ V # E. How U is related to H?
options: Uncle
Aunt
Brother-in-law
Sister-in-law
none of these

quiz.text: G # A @ E * O % M & N @Z # G, If A is male, then how A is related to G?
options: brother
uncle
son
father
cannot be determined

quiz.text: Statements: M @ I & C # Q;  L @ O & W;  Q % S # T ^ Y;  H * W @ Y * E How Q is related to E?
options: Son
Son-in-law
Grand son
daughter
none of these

quiz.text: In which of the following expressions T is maternal uncle of P?
options: Z ^ S # V % T @ I % O @ P * U
S * Z % T # V @ I & O @ P ^ U
V @ S & Z # V @ T % I # P ^ U
S # Z @ V & T @ I & O # P ^ U
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following option correctly fill the blank so that W is father-in-law of L? J # W _ Q _ S * Y _ P % N _ L
options: &, @. %, *
&, *, %, ^
%, @, &, ^
#, %, @, *
none of these

quiz.text: If N @ S then how Y is related to N?
options: Uncle
Aunt
Sister-in-law
sister
none of these

quiz.text: How G is related to H?
options: brother
uncle
brother-in-law
son
none of these

quiz.text: How E is related to V?
options: brother
sister
brother-in-law
cousin
none of these

quiz.text: Pointing to a photograph of Hardeep, Vinay said, “ The father of his sister is the husband of my wife’s mother. How is Vinay related to Hardeep?
options: Brother
Father
Son
Brother-in-law
none of these.

quiz.text: Reetu told Manisha. “ The girl I met yesterday at the beach was the youngest daughter of the brother in law of my friends’ mother” How is the girl related to reetu’s friend?
options: Cousin
Daughter
Niece
Friend
none of these

quiz.text: Examine the following relationships among members of a family of six persons P, Q, R, S, T, and U. I: The number of males equals that of females II: P and T are sons of U. III: S is the mother of two, one boy and one girl IV: Q is the son of P V: There is only one married couple in the family at present.   Which one of the following inferences can be drawn from the above?
options: P, Q, and R are all females
P is the husband of S
T and U are children of S
S is the granddaughter U
none of these

quiz.text: Pointing out to a photograph, a man tells his friend," she is the daughter of the only son of my father's wife. How is the girl related to the man in the photograph?
options: Daughter
Cousin
Mother
Sister
None of these
